#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define gi(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define pb push_back
#define rep(i,n)  for(__typeof(n) i =  0;  (i) < (n);  ++i)
#define fu(i,a,b) for(__typeof(a) i = (a); (i) <= (b); ++i)
#define tr(v,it)  for(__typeof(v.begin()) it=v.begin();it!=v.end();++it)


typedef long long ll;
typedef long long unsigned lolo;
typedef vector <int> vi;
typedef pair< int ,int > pii;

vi g[100100];
bool vis[100100];
vi ans;

int cnt;

bool dfs(int u,int q) {
  cnt++;
  ans.pb(u);
  if(cnt == q) return true;
  vis[u] = 1;
  tr(g[u],it) {
    if(!vis[*it]) {
      if(dfs(*it,q)) return true;
      else ans.pop_back();
    }
  }
  return false;
}

int main(){

  int T,N;
  ll Q;
  gi(T);
  while(T--) {
    memset(vis,0,sizeof(vis));
    ans.clear();
    gi(N);
    fu(i,0,N) g[i].clear();
    scanf("%lld",&Q);
    rep(i,N-1) {
      int a,b;
      gi(a); gi(b);
      g[a].pb(b);
      g[b].pb(a);
    }
    fu(i,0,N) sort(g[i].begin(),g[i].end());
    int first = Q / N;
    int second = Q % N;
    if(second) first++;
    else second = N;
    cnt = 0;
    dfs(first,second);
    tr(ans,it) printf("%d ",*it);
    printf("\n");
  }
  return 0;
}
